start.state: The defense is ready to play.

case.state: What's it gonna be?
So many choices, ~name~.
You don't need it anyway.
Ah, there's a detective on the scene. What evidence can you share with us, Ms. Kirigiri?
Misty?
Amazing that we're here already.
Don't sweat it, Link. If Nintendo does go after you, you can come see us as legal advisors!
Finally making some progress.
I was never much for video games, although Maya's a pretty big fan.
In my line of work, the quiet ones almost always have something valuable to contribute.
You know, I never thought a princess could be so... down to earth.
You know, I read your case file earlier, Elizabeth. You've lived quite the life.
You're magic is pretty fascinating.
So, you're a secret agent Kim? Like Interpol?
Looks like your deductive skills could use some work.
I've always respected adventurers.
It'll be interesting to see how someone from a lawless land does at this.
Reading your case file, Zoey, I'm glad I came back as a ghost and not a zombie.
Adding that to the Court Record.
Looking good!
Ah. I think I get it now.
Your testimony could probably get that resolved in two days, tops!
It's making me feel bad...
I think I feel a migraine coming on...
Do they really come that big?
It looks like we're about to see something big...
Keep it going, ~name~.
Frankly, I'd rather not be around here right now.
I thought this would go faster.
Personally, I don't see the appeal.
But don't worry about it. It doesn't concern you specifically.
Relax a little.
It's not my birthday, is it?
We need to know all the details to reach the end!
Alright, ~name~, your turn.
Don't chicken out, ~name~.
And thus the truth is laid bare.
Hold it, this is a contradiction to the evidence!
If you, uh, want privacy, I'll look away.
Seeing as you're a spirit, would you like me to "channel" you?
...Those aren't actual spirits, right?
You're not concerned your friend is watching you do this?
It's amazing how much you can see a person change over the course of one day. Hard to believe you're the same aloof Samus!
Alright, Shantae can set the pace for the rest of us!
Here it comes.
Nonetheless, it's valuable evidence.
~Clothing~ removed from the Court Record.
Phoenix wanted to give him a private law lesson, but he couldn't come out to the Inventory to ask you himself.
So there really are talking turtles in your world, April? Maybe Phoenix was onto something with the parrot...
So I guess we have something in common, BlackRose.
I hardly ever intended to find a blatant killer through strip poker...
I'd love to have a conversation with you in a less...high-stakes environment.
I've learned to never underestimate the ditz.
Perhaps you'd like to meet a certain prosecutor with similar tastes?
The blue reminds me of the ocean near my village.
You're...well-acquainted with the host here, right Elaine?
How awful!
Mainly because I don't know what would happen if someone didn't.
Man, what the prosecutors in my city would do to you...
As a lawyer, it pains me that I'm actually trying to avoid eye contact.
Do you think she'd like your autograph?
I look forward to playing with you.
You should contact my clan sometime. We'd make great business partners!
You'd get along great with my cousin Pearl.
I recognize the style of dress. Unfortunately.
She's certainly pretty enough.
A lot of people could learn from you, Piper.
We'll see the real you soon enough.
I know your situation too well.
Just like Maya, in that sense.
I see you won't go down easy. As expected of someone with your reputation!
I do appreciate your pragmatism, though.
So you're a dancer then, Shantae? Nothing demeaning, I hope.
Let's see how this goes.
Something about your appearance brought it to mind.
We could use someone like you in our city.
See, this is why we use spirit mediums.
Oh! I'm, uh, asking for Phoenix. Wright.
I'm glad you're putting that thought to rest, Ms. Oxton.
Come to think of it, am I the first real ghost you've dealt with?
Very nice!
If you want me to turn around, just say so.
No objections here.
Well, we know whose milkshake brings all the boys to the yard...
A guy? Well, let's see.
Go on, ~name~.
No choice.
Please give a demonstration to the court, ~name~.
This is going to be interesting indeed...
No choice now, ~name~.
Nothing to be ashamed of, ~name~.
That's a pretty small thing.
Objection!
So, Caleb, are you some sort of mascot for a new restaurant or something?
Don't take this the wrong way, but your fashion sense is bringing up memories I'd rather not relive.
You're still too uptight, Ryu.
No, uh, further questions.
Maya's used to be like that, ~name~. It's cute.
A respectable set.
I didn't think you'd choose that of all things.
Annie, would you mind introducing me to this "Winger" guy later?
You know, I just realized: spirit mediums are sort of like avatars.
Vampire hunter, I presume? You won't have to worry about me, at least.
Well, this is awkward.
So I hear Ms. Song here is quite the accomplished woman.
Hmm...
I knew you'd pull something like this.
I hear you're a big coffee fan.
I like your hair, Dawn.
It's nothing bad. Just have have a few opinions I'd like to share.
So you really didn't know what you were getting into?
I have my eye on you, Ice Witch.
Harley Quinn?
So when you say you're a "bender", what does that mean? Are you flexible?
Man, that eye is unnerving!
Lyn, you look like you'd fit in perfectly in one of Maya's action cartoons, especially with that sword.
Well, you're not the worst May I've met in my life.
So, Mercy, you're some sort of necromancer?
Sorry, the name just caught me off-guard.
Well, aren't you just adorable.
Do you work for a cafe, Nugi-chan?
Always nice to see another professional, even if we're on...opposite ends of the legal spectrum.
I wonder if Princess Peach was the inspiration for that Pink Princess show Maya raves about...
It's nice to see journalists with integrity these days.
Don't think acting acting dark and mysterious will scare us.
I just wanted to say I adore how much you care for your Lumas, Rosalina.
You can't help but admire that level of optimism.
Your combadge? Why would you ever surrender such an essential part of your repertoire?
Australian, huh? Never met someone from there before.
Have you heard of the Yatagarasu, Sheena?
So... I hear you're Special Forces, Sonya.
How'd you get that in here?
Oh yeah, I almost forgot to ask. Got any Phoenix Downs, Tifa?
Thanks to Edgeworth, I always imagine British people as pompous perfectionists.
Tell me, Velma: can you find the ghost this time?
Apparently having the Triforce of Wisdom doesn't mean anything thing if a princess chooses to come to a this type of game.
I can't believe I pulled it off!
Here it comes.
I'm no courtroom psychologist, but even I can tell when someone really needs help.
Bit off topic, but Meg, have you ever considered going to the police to deal for your whole "axe murderer" problem?
You're being way too apologetic.
Ugh.
Not bad.
Nice to see that regular people were invited too. Makes me feel a little better.
No, uh, further questions.
It's time, ~name~.
Sorry if this sounds rude, but this might not be the game for you.
You're pretty eager about this...
Next hand, please.
Maybe you can show me how yours works sometime, Asuna?
That, or some sort of trauma. But I'm sure Chell's fine.
It's comforting.
I'm here if you ever need to talk.
I've only ever known circus magicians, so seeing the real deal is neat.
Hmmm, there's a contradiction here. I just know it.
Man, I miss the days when the agency dealt with simple local cases.
You live a much more interesting life than someone like me ever did...
I bet you have a lot of experience with this type of game, eh Lilith?
I'd never forgive myself if I ended up as that "Witch" thing. But I digress.
Wait...next is!
I've got it!
This should be more than sufficient.
I almost never have this good luck!
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
Not too sure on this.
I can handle this.
Could be worse, honestly.
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
Am I missing something?
There's gotta be something I can use...
Think, Mia, think...
I've played Phoenix before. I'm used to bad hands...
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
I miss my ~clothing~ already...
I'm up?
Let's do it!
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"
Why yes Futaba, I am- no, was a lawyer.
How would you know that, Mr. Pit? Unless... are you here to take me to heaven or whatever?
Oh... uh... thank you Sei?
To be honest, this is nothing compared to some of the witnesses I've seen over the years. You'd probably pull your hair out, Seven.
I'll test the waters, I guess.
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"

Off they come...
That's... half-right, Aimee.
The Dark Age of the Law affected more than I realized... I'm sorry to hear that, Futaba.
Ah, that's a relief. I'd hate to leave Maya here on such a short notice.
Ah yes. That movie was terrible.
It was foolish to think I would make it unscathed.
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"

You know, I never thought a princess could be so... down to earth.
You know, I read your case file earlier, Elizabeth. You've lived quite the life.
You're magic is pretty fascinating.
I can't quite place it, but there's something different about you, Jasmine.
So, you're a secret agent Kim? Like Interpol?
Looks like your deductive skills could use some work.
I've always respected adventurers.
It'll be interesting to see how someone from a lawless land does at this.
Reading your case file, Zoey, I'm glad I came back as a ghost and not a zombie.
Adding that to the Court Record.
Very nice.
Maybe you should go home like that.
Ah. I think I get it now.
Your testimony could probably get that resolved in two days, tops!
It's making me feel bad...
I think I feel a migraine coming on...
Do they really come that big?
It looks like we're about to see something big...
Maybe you could double down? Just a suggestion.
Frankly, I'd rather not be around here right now.
Well, I disappointed myself.
Boring.
Personally, I don't see the appeal.
But don't worry about it. It doesn't concern you specifically.
Relax a little.
You were caught with your pants down, ~name~. It's time.
That's an interesting strategy.
I won't look if it makes you feel better.
~name~. You know the rules.
My my.
Hold it, this is a contradiction to the evidence!
This trial's just getting started.
Seeing as you're a spirit, would you like me to "channel" you?
...Those aren't actual spirits, right?
You're not concerned your friend is watching you do this?
It's amazing how much you can see a person change over the course of one day. Hard to believe you're the same aloof Samus!
Alright, Shantae can set the pace for the rest of us!
Let's see...
That's a shame.
Phoenix wanted to give him a private law lesson, but he couldn't come out to the Inventory to ask you himself.
So there really are talking turtles in your world, April? Maybe Phoenix was onto something with the parrot...
So I guess we have something in common, BlackRose.
I hardly ever intended to find a blatant killer through strip poker...
I'd love to have a conversation with you in a less...high-stakes environment.
I've learned to never underestimate the ditz.
Perhaps you'd like to meet a certain prosecutor with similar tastes?
The blue reminds me of the ocean near my village.
You're...well-acquainted with the host here, right Elaine?
How awful!
Mainly because I don't know what would happen if someone didn't.
Man, what the prosecutors in my city would do to you...
As a lawyer, it pains me that I'm actually trying to avoid eye contact.
Do you think she'd like your autograph?
I look forward to how this'll go.
You should contact my clan sometime. We'd make great business partners!
You'd get along great with my cousin Pearl.
I recognize the style of dress. Unfortunately.
She's certainly pretty enough.
A lot of people could learn from you, Piper.
We'll see the real you soon enough.
I know your situation too well.
Just like Maya, in that sense.
I see you won't go down easy. As expected of someone with your reputation!
I do appreciate your pragmatism, though.
So you're a dancer then, Shantae? Nothing demeaning, I hope.
Let's see how this goes.
Something about your appearance brought it to mind.
We could use someone like you in our city.
See, this is why we use spirit mediums.
Oh! I'm, uh, asking for Phoenix. Wright.
I'm glad you're putting that thought to rest, Ms. Oxton.
Come to think of it, am I the first real ghost you've dealt with?
I'm not staring... maybe a little.
I have to say, ~name~, I'm impressed!
Excuse me if I watch your technique.
No objections here.
Well, we know whose milkshake brings all the boys to the yard...
Ms. Chen has really made a name for herself. With your chest, I'd wager, ~name~.
~name~ looks a bit red.
So it's ~name~'s turn now.
Show us your "Dance of Devotion", ~name~!
As your legal counsel, I advise that you comply with this order of unrestraint, ~name~.
I won't look if it makes you feel better.
~name~. You know the rules.
Nothing to be ashamed of, ~name~.
Taking off something big now...?
So, Caleb, are you some sort of mascot for a new restaurant or something?
Don't take this the wrong way, but your fashion sense is bringing up memories I'd rather not relive.
You're still too uptight, Ryu.
Hey! This dress is expensive! Don't stain it!
Maya's used to be like that, ~name~. It's cute.
A respectable set.
Just that?
Annie, would you mind introducing me to this "Winger" guy later?
You know, I just realized: spirit mediums are sort of like avatars.
Vampire hunter, I presume? You won't have to worry about me, at least.
Well, this is awkward.
So I hear Ms. Song here is quite the accomplished woman.
Hmm...
I knew you'd pull something like this.
I hear you're a big coffee fan.
I like your hair, Dawn.
It's nothing bad. Just have have a few opinions I'd like to share.
So you really didn't know what you were getting into?
I have my eye on you, Ice Witch.
Harley Quinn?
So when you say you're a "bender", what does that mean? Are you flexible?
Man, that eye is unnerving!
Lyn, you look like you'd fit in perfectly in one of Maya's action cartoons, especially with that sword.
Well, you're not the worst May I've met in my life.
So, Mercy, you're some sort of necromancer?
Sorry, the name just caught me off-guard.
Well, aren't you just adorable.
Do you work for a cafe, Nugi-chan?
Always nice to see another professional, even if we're on...opposite ends of the legal spectrum.
I wonder if Princess Peach was the inspiration for that Pink Princess show Maya raves about...
It's nice to see journalists with integrity these days.
Don't think acting acting dark and mysterious will scare us.
I just wanted to say I adore how much you care for your Lumas, Rosalina.
You can't help but admire that level of optimism.
Your combadge? Why would you ever surrender such an essential part of your repertoire?
Australian, huh? Never met someone from there before.
Have you heard of the Yatagarasu, Sheena?
So... I hear you're Special Forces, Sonya.
How'd you get that in here?
Oh yeah, I almost forgot to ask. Got any Phoenix Downs, Tifa?
Thanks to Edgeworth, I always imagine British people as pompous perfectionists.
Tell me, Velma: can you find the ghost this time?
Apparently having the Triforce of Wisdom doesn't mean anything thing if a princess chooses to come to a this type of game.
I can't believe I pulled it off!
Let's take a good look...
I'm no courtroom psychologist, but even I can tell when someone really needs help.
Bit off topic, but Meg, have you ever considered going to the police to deal for your whole "axe murderer" problem?
You're being way too apologetic.
Ugh.
That's not much at all.
Nice to see that regular people were invited too. Makes me feel a little better.
You look so... vulnerable like that.
It's time, ~name~.
Sorry if this sounds rude, but this might not be the game for you.
You're really going fast now.
Still a while before the good stuff.
Slowly but surely.
Maybe you can show me how yours works sometime, Asuna?
That, or some sort of trauma. But I'm sure Chell's fine.
It's comforting.
I'm here if you ever need to talk.
I've only ever known circus magicians, so seeing the real deal is neat.
Your shoes don't match your cloak, but there's something else I can't quite place.
Man, I miss the days when the agency dealt with simple local cases.
You live a much more interesting life than someone like me ever did...
I bet you have a lot of experience with this type of game, eh Lilith?
I'd never forgive myself if I ended up as that "Witch" thing. But I digress.
Wait...next is!
I've got it!
This should be more than sufficient.
I almost never have this good luck!
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
Not too sure on this.
I can handle this.
Could be worse, honestly.
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
Am I missing something?
There's gotta be something I can use...
Think, Mia, think...
I've played Phoenix before. I'm used to bad hands...
Happy Valentine's Day everyone! Today was a good day to be channeled.
I gave up the spiritual lifestyle long ago. In a sense, anyway.
Haah...
It's not an uncommon item, Futaba. At least where I'm from.
Have you not picked up on it yet, Hermione? I almost don't want to tell you.
It's not exactly an amulet, but yes, Jasmine. At one point, this was a valuable tool for me.
No, Phoenix does that to himself, usually.
It's not reincarnation, Sonya. Why don't you explain it, ~player~?
It's not reincarnation, Sonya. Why don't you explain it, ~player~?
But I'd have to say probably not. We channel the dead, not the undead.
Jeez, even my trials never go this poor.
I hoped it wouldn't come to this, but as they say...
Fair's fair, even if I don't like it.
I'm reminded of Ms. May all of a sudden.
Go ahead, don't mind us.
Who's the victim this time?
Misty?
Think of it like the beach, ~name~.
This I've gotta see.
One more piece out of the way.
Adding that to the Court Record.
Make yourself comfortable. Like me.
Sorry, ~name~. Normally I defend the innocent, but you are way too cute for me to stop you.
Don't worry! I believe in your innocence!
Dangos? Aw, Maya used to love singing their little theme song.
Out of all the spirits I've spoken too, you're definitely the oddest one... and the least dressed!
Do they really come that big?
Are you okay with showing it?
It'll be like the beach soon.
I'm in my underwear, you can do better.
Sorry Mr. ~name~. You were close, but not close enough.
Hmm. Could you explain your technique to us?
OK, ~name~, show it.
All you can do is strip, ~name~!
That must've taken a lot of courage, ~name~.
Take your time. We aren't going anywhere.
Step up to the stand, ~name~!
I guess I was singled out.
Oh! I'm, uh, asking for Phoenix. Wright.
Make yourself comfortable, ~name~. I already have.
Time to sue your pants off!
Let's see you at work.
I won't object.
Well, we know whose milkshake brings all the boys to the yard...
This is exciting me more than it should.
Maybe karma is favoring me today.
It's time to face the music, ~name~.
Okay, ~name~, show it.
Go ahead and take it off, ~name~.
Nothing to be ashamed of, ~name~.
Come on now.
Where were you aiming that?!
Maya's used to be like that, ~name~. It's cute.
A well-defined set.
That's it?
Sorry, the name just caught me off-guard.
Oh yeah, thanks for the reminder. Got any Phoenix Downs, Tifa?
Say, how about dinner. On me?
Step up to the stand, ~name~!
NOW it gets fun.
Getting closer.
That was very... explosive, ~name~.
Feeling cornered, ~name~?
Hmm. Could you explain your technique to us?
We can't overlook the smallest details, after all.
Wait...next is!
Moment of truth.
Yes! Safe!
Please be enough.
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
Gotta think outside the box on this one.
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets.
Do you... not like lawyers, Asuna?
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets. You must not know very good lawyers, Sonya.
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets. You must not know very good lawyers, Sonya.
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets. (And Xander's commentary is only making this harder.)
I object to this!
I think I need to reconsider how I spend my time.
I-I should have been more careful.
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest...
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest... like a certain redhead over there.
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest... like a certain redhead over there.
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest... like a certain redhead over there.
Of course, men love my chest more, Meia.
Well, since even the goody-goody cherub has been staring at my chest...
Well, since you've all been ogling my chest like a certain awkward man over there...
Well, since you've all been ogling my chest like a certain awkward man over there...
Well, since you've all been ogling my chest like a certain awkward man over there...
I know you want to see my chest- looking at you Zone-tan!
W-well, at least I won't be alone.
C'mon ~name~, off with it.
Let's level the playing field.
M-Misty?
I can see you're shaking.
Even though I'm at a disadvantage...
No need to explain, ~name~.
I shouldn't be the only one showing skin.
Oh... just like his...
Your luck's run out too, it seems.
Well, ~name~, hope you don't mind being bottomless.
Looks like we'll be on even ground, Ms. Fit.
Eye for an eye, you know?
How do you have your ~clothing~ left?
Here we go!
I just realized that might be me soon...
It's exciting seeing how others do it.
C'mon ~name~, off with it.
Let's level the playing field.
At least we're in it together.
Huh. Thought I'd be the only one to do choose bottoms first.
No need to rush.
About time.
How do you have your ~clothing~ left?
If I'm gonna be eye candy, I should get some too.
...Fine, I'll try not to look.
I think you look just fine.
They're practically balloons!
Well, your milkshakes must bring all the boys to the yard.
With my current state of dress, I say this is fair.
You've seen me, time to return the favor.
How confident are you in your skills?
You've seen me, time to return the favor.
With my current state of dress, I say this is fair.
Huh. Why does Mr. Kudo come to mind?
Aww, look at the cute little guy!
I'm practically naked!
Please, point that somewhere else!
Aww, they're adorable.
They compliment you well.
You can't cry yet! The only time you can cry is when it's all over.
I'm practically naked!
Sorry, just didn't expect that name here.
I can't believe I pulled it off!
About time.
C'mon, work with me here.
I think you had fun doing that.
And now you're all wet.
What will they be like, I wonder...
I think you might like this.
I WILL see this through.
Looks like we'll both be bottomless, ~name~.
I think I see it twitching, and it's not even out.
The turnabout starts now!
I hate leaving my fate to chance...
I'm fine!
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
Is this the end?
Stick a fork in me, I'm done.
Think you've earned a glimpse? Think again!
What do you mean, "unhygenic"? If you have a problem, take it up with Maya.
What do you mean, "unhygenic"? If you have a problem, take it up with Maya.
I wouldn't say bold... more like... turning thins around.
Maybe you should, Ms. Song. I think the others would eat it right up.
Don't worry, Ms. Song. There's still plenty of opportunities for you to lose your panties.
I don't think I've quite reached your level yet, Ms. Song.
Uh, don't mention it, Ms. Song.
Then it seems my plan worked out.
Oh... I even threw the detective for a loop? This was more effective than I thought!
Which is why I'm saving it for last.
Don't worry Nagisa. I know what I'm doing.
You didn't have to point that out, Nugi-chan. Maybe this was a bad idea...
We'll see about that, Miss Goddess of Light.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but that's kind of already happened.
Nothing against it!
(I don't need your love!)
Oh, Videl. If only you knew.
Whoops, too bad! You'll just have to accept the consolation prize.
No, wait! There is, uh, a clear...contradiction here?
No, wait! There is, uh, a clear...contradiction here?
Crap.
Alright, this is it. The real deal!
No, wait! There is, uh, a clear...contradiction here?
Continue please, Ms. ~name~.
You're up to bat, ~name~!
M-Misty?
I can see you're shaking.
Could be worse.
No need to explain, ~name~.
Adding that to the Court Record.
Man, this is getting heated.
Just like Diego's!
I guess you have to show 'that' to me now, ~name~...
That doesn't make me feel any better.
You all just wanted to get me naked, right?
Court is now in session, ~name~.
Do you have experience with this type of thing?
I'm not turned on! It's just Maya's body being weird!
Testify, sister!
Continue please, Ms. ~name~.
You're up to bat, ~name~!
Stay levelheaded now.
After all, it'll be showtime soon.
You knew what you were getting into.
Maybe we can all stop and just watch her? No?
Sorry if I blush...
You all just wanted to get me naked, right?
That accessory... is an accessory to a crime!
I can't help but stare.
... You can look at me if you need help.
I think you look just fine.
They're practically balloons!
Off with it, ~name~!
You're up, ~name~!
The fun's about to start.
Off with it, ~name~!
You're up, ~name~!
Huh. Why does Mr. Kudo come to mind?
This is a sham!
You practically exploded!
You made quite the scene.
How nice.
I can appreciate the smaller things in life.
Ms. Chen, I'm going to have to ask for a saved copy of your stream... as evidence.
This is a sham!
Sorry, just didn't expect that name here.
I can't believe I pulled it off!
Sorry if I blush...
Could be worse.
I think our witness had a breakdown.
Did it like a champ!
The defense wants to see some action!
Haven't been in a situation like this in fifteen years.
C'mon ~name~! Get the lead out, as it were.
It doesn't make me feel any better.
The defense wants to see some action!
C'mon ~name~, don't be shy.
We're holding off on the verdict for now.
Go ahead. Try and beat this hand!
Dodged a bullet there.
Is it too late to try bluffing?
Well, at least I haven't reached Ms. Byrde's level of luck yet.
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
I need a miracle...
Hope you don't mind, Maya...
This'll be weird with all of you watching me.
I bet Diego would've loved to see this.
Thanks, but I'll do it my way.
I appreciate it, Pit, but just let me do this.
Keep it cool, Mia... you're only naked in front of strangers...
That's right, Sonya... I'm not a pushover. I've come back from worse!
And that's exactly why I took off my underwear first.
I thought I was better than this.
There's nothing left... it's over...
Would it be too much to ask you to look away?
Could you pose for me?
Ah...
M-Misty?
Show me some evidence, ~name~!
So close...
That'll do nicely...
Thanks...
Ooooh boy...
This might be the first time I've wanted evidence rubbed in my face.
Will there be any contradictions in your "evidence"?
If only I lasted longer...
I don't do pro bono work, you know.
We have to do it at the same time?!
If you're watching me, I guess I'll watch you too...
Maybe I'll try it like you.
Could you pose for me?
Ah...
Perfectly admissable!
Guess we're in this together now, eh ~name~?
Let's show them how close attorneys and detectives can be, Ms. Kirigiri...
That's it, ~name~...
Way to dampen the mood.
I feel a lot better...
Sorry...I'm not good at this.
Perfect.
Fabulous!
Show me more...
Put on a show...please?
I've been asked before, but I never thought I'd actually do it!
Show me more...
Put on a show...please?
It's not because of me, is it?
Aw...
I kinda wanted to finish at the same time...
I see how it is.
Hold it, stay just like that.
The court accepts this!
Aw...
Oh god... why'd you have to say that now?
I can't believe I pulled it off!
Go on, ~name~...
So close...
I noticed you finished before me.
Oh...well, I'll keep going then...
Show me some evidence, ~name~!
Maybe we can match each other's rhythm?
I-I've only ever been this intimate with one other guy...
If only I was better at this...
Draw your weapon, ~name~!
Mmm...
Mmm... Ahhh....
Oh god... Ohh...
Hah...You're all staring...
Mmmm... Please, look away...
Oh... you're... watching...
Ahhh.... Ahhh...
Oh...Yes...
Ohh... This feels so good...
Hah... Don't look...
So... humiliating...
Ohhh...
I can't believe I'm masturbating in someone else's body...
Tsk... So shameful...
Yes... Mmm!.. Ahhh...
Ahhh... I'm... so close...
I think I'm close...
Ah! Now...?
I must... keep pressing on!
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
I could've used this a while ago...
Did I read the rules wrong?
Am I staring? Sorry...
Like that.
Eep!
Maybe this will answer a few questions.
I thought I was a decent player.
Of course you'd still have that.
I call Mr. ~name~ to take the stand.
I almost wish I lasted longer.
You're really going at it!
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
Yep, cleared them riiiiight up.
We're nearing the end, I feel.
I would've liked this earlier.
Here I am, and you're just starting...
Nervous, ~name~?
You were ready for this, weren't you?
What I wouldn't do for Mr. Justice's perception skills right about now.
Talk about eye candy!
So, uh, guess I'm not the only top-heavy one.
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
I call Ms. ~name~ to take the stand.
Go nice and slow for us.
Don't stare...don't stare...
Pull it together, Mia...
Don't be shy. You've seen me at my worst, after all.
Just my luck.
Maybe I'll take some of the evidence home...
Oh, you made quite the crime scene...
How quaint.
I like them, they're really cute.
Let your inhibitions go, and move on.
Wow.
I can't believe I pulled it off!
Join me in indecency, ~name~.
Did I read the rules wrong?
Feels good, doesn't it?
Found a new hobby, ~name~?
Share your secrets, ~name~!
Go ahead ~name~, we're waiting.
Losing's not that bad, all things considered.
Don't worry, I'll defend you if you're arrested for public indecency.
I thought I was a decent player.
How about you give me a good memory?
I'm done...
What's that supposed to mean?
Please don't tell the Agency about this.
You, uh, didn't tape that or anything, did you?
I, uh, hope you don't think less of me for that.
So when can I get dressed? This is kind of embarrassing...
Right... so... how's everyone doing?
Can someone hand me a towel? I'd rather not stand here in my own juices.
It's a good thing Maya is unconscious while I use her body. I'm not sure she could handle a place like this.
I may have lost, but this has still been a pretty fun night.
If nothing else, tonight made for good practice for my games with Phoenix.
I think this was a good use of my time back.
Wouldn't it be just my luck if someone got murdered tonight...? Nah, that would never happen.
None of you are very adept at cards, are you?
Well, long as I'm out, might as well enjoy the festivities.
Congratulations, ~name~. Your win was well-earned.

text.content: There's not much time left. Time to submit Exhibit D!
Ahhhh! Ahhhh!
If there's one thing I miss most about being alive, it's probably liaisons like this, ~name~.
I wish I could enjoy you longer, but I've already drained her of so much spiritual power today.
Maya's had to get used to waking up to some pretty sticky situations after channeling me!
Say hi to my sister for me, won't you?
Huh?
Ah! You're naked! And I'm...
She told me she was just going to play cards this time...
But here I am in my apartment totally wet. Again.
It could be worse. This guy is really cute.
And at least she isn't having Pearly do this...
Well, since we're here already...
Wanna have some fun?
That was amazing, ~name~!
The way you used your tongue... Ema would be jealous!
It, um, was totally necessary for recharging my channeling power, of course.
I'm opening the connection to my sister now.
Please be gentle. No rope marks! Remember, it's still my body.
~name~. Hello.
I see that you and Maya had some fun.
Oh, she said no bondage tonight?
Why don't you get some of Maya's toys? They're in the dresser.
Yes, the Steel Samurai one. Turn it on.
Wait, get a second one. We'll go together.
Oh... Ahh... Just a little higher...
Excellent technique, ~name~.
Now get out of that bra and go get me the rope.
